About Me

Hi! My name is Trishala Neeraj. I am a first-year graduate student in the Information Science Department at Cornell University at Cornell Tech. I am an aspiring data scientist, currently working at the Social Technologies Lab as part of my graduate research. My interests lie in Machine Learning and Deep Learning. In the coming semesters I will be starting official work on my Master's Thesis that will primarily be at the intersection of Natural Language Processing and Digital Journalism, aimed at better understanding wealth inequality. I will be advised by Dr. Mor Naaman and Dr. Yoav Artzi.

I obtained my undergraduate degree from BITS Pilani, India, in May 2016. I completed my Undergraduate Thesis under the supervision of Dr. Matthew Gerber at the Predictive Technology Laboratory at University of Virginia.
